name: linguaseek
tag_list: language, linguistics, writing, writing-systems, transliteration, search, multi-lingual, multilingual, internationalization, globalization, i18n, localization, l10n, latin, cyrillic, indic, arabic, greek, hebrew, russian, georgian, persian, farsi, sorani
overview:
A universal transliteration tool that enables access to virtually every language.

Search the web, generate content for use in other places, without the need for custom keyboards.

A single and simple interface provides transliteration capabilities that can be plugged into any website, search engine or any web form. All that is required is rendering support (fonts) on end users’ browsers.

Transliteration is based on standards and optimized for input. A simple UI allows users to edit machine generated transliterations with simple mouse clicks.

The product is available as a web service and a java applet. A javascript version can be made available if necessary.

www.linguaseek.com demonstrates product capabilities. Licensing will enable other sites to provide similar functionality, instantly “internationalizing” a site or product.

The product has been reviewed by linguists from all over the world and has been praised and approved by many.
